lead_paragraph: A double amputee who uses a wheelchair is suing for access to the grave of his two-legged cat, arguing that the Ohio property's new owners discriminated against him by installing landscaping barriers that block his way.
snippet: A double amputee who uses a wheelchair is suing for access to the grave of his two-legged cat, arguing that the Ohio property's new owners discriminated against him by installing landscaping barriers that block his way....

headline.main: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform
headline.print_headline: EU Nations Thrash Out Deal on Carbon Market Reform
